Hi guys, I'm Laura Vitale and on this episode
of Laura in the Kitchen, I'm going to share

with you how to make a fabulous cherry pie,
I love cherry pie, you've been requesting

it for a long time, I didn't even have a clue
that I didn't have this recipe up on Laura

in the Kitchen, which I didn't know why, it's
so easy and it's basically like the same thing

the same thing as the filling for my blueberry

pie which is delicious, I know I did it a
long time ago but it's worth mentioning because
it's just such a good classic.

The only difference is I substitute about
a quarter teaspoon of almond extract for the

cinnamon that I add in the blueberry pie,
and I know that sounds crazy but it makes

it really delicious and it almost enhances
the flavor of the cherries.
